    eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.measures  

    • Uses of Measure in eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.measures

      Classes in eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.measures that implement Measure 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Accumulate
      This measure is used to average the outcome of a base measure over given frames of time.
      class  HitRate
      Provides a HitRate@k evaluation, which ensures that one of the occurred interaction lies among the top k recommendations provided by SocialGraphMiner.recommendInteractions(Context).
